examples.name: Basic Pop Song
examples.description: Generate a simple pop song with lyrics

input.lyrics: [intro-short] ; [verse] 雪花舞动在无尽的天际.情缘如同雪花般轻轻逝去.希望与真挚.永不磨灭.你的忧虑.随风而逝 ; [chorus] 我怀抱着守护这片梦境.在这世界中寻找爱与虚幻.苦辣酸甜.我们一起品尝.在雪的光芒中.紧紧相拥 ; [outro-short]
input.descriptions: female, bright, pop, happy, piano and drums

examples.name: Jazz Style with Auto Prompt
examples.description: Generate a jazz song using auto prompt

input.lyrics: [verse] 月光洒满大地.星星在天空中闪烁.我们手牵手走过.这美好的夜晚.心中充满温暖.爱意如潮水般涌来 ; [chorus] 让我们一起歌唱.在这美丽的夜晚.让爱永远陪伴.直到永远

examples.name: Rock Song with Separate Tracks
examples.description: Generate a rock song with separate vocal and BGM tracks

input.lyrics: [verse] 时光飞逝如流水.岁月如歌般悠扬.我们在这人生路上.寻找着属于自己的方向 ; [chorus] 让我们一起前行.在这美好的时光里.让梦想照亮前方.让希望永远不灭
input.descriptions: male, powerful, rock, energetic, electric guitar and drums

input.lyrics: [intro-long] ; [verse] 花朵绽放如诗篇.随风轻舞动.湖面波光映倒影.心随波浪荡漾中.感受着这美好时光.仿佛梦境般飘渺 ; [chorus] 唱啊唱.爱意围绕在身边.唱啊唱.心情如此欢畅.阳光洒满湖面.一切都如此美好 ; [inst-long] ; [outro-long]
input.descriptions: orchestral, classical, peaceful, strings and woodwinds, slow tempo

input.lyrics: [intro-short] ; [verse] 节奏在心中跳动.音乐让我们自由.在这舞池中央.释放所有的热情 ; [chorus] 让我们一起跳舞.在这音乐的海洋里.让快乐永远陪伴.让激情永不熄灭 ; [outro-short]
input.descriptions: electronic, dance, upbeat, synthesizer and beats, fast tempo

examples.name: Chinese Traditional
examples.description: Generate a traditional Chinese style song

input.lyrics: [intro-long] ; [verse] 山水之间.云雾缭绕.古琴悠扬.诗意盎然.在这宁静的时光里.感受着传统文化的魅力 ; [chorus] 让我们一起传承.在这古老的文化中.让智慧永远流传.让美好永远延续 ; [inst-long] ; [outro-long]

parameter_descriptions.lyrics: The lyrics for the song in a specific format with sections like [intro], [verse], [chorus], [outro]
parameter_descriptions.descriptions: Text description of musical style, genre, instruments, mood, etc.
parameter_descriptions.auto_prompt_type: Predefined musical styles: Pop, R&B, Dance, Jazz, Folk, Rock, Chinese Style, Chinese Tradition, Metal, Reggae, Chinese Opera, Auto
parameter_descriptions.generate_type: Generation type: mixed (combined audio), vocal (vocals only), bgm (background music only), separate (separate vocal and BGM files)
parameter_descriptions.temperature: Controls randomness in generation (0.0-1.0, higher = more random)
parameter_descriptions.cfg_coef: Classifier-free guidance coefficient (1.0-2.0, higher = more controlled)
parameter_descriptions.top_k: Top-k sampling parameter (1-100, lower = more focused)
parameter_descriptions.top_p: Top-p sampling parameter (0.0-1.0, lower = more focused)
parameter_descriptions.max_duration: Maximum duration of generated song in seconds (5-60)
parameter_descriptions.use_flash_attn: Use flash attention for faster inference (requires compatible GPU)
parameter_descriptions.low_mem: Use low memory mode for memory-constrained environments

lyrics_format.example: [intro-short] ; [verse] 歌词内容 ; [chorus] 副歌内容 ; [outro-short]
